mapper.select: select t1.rel_id , t1.rel_status , t1.user_id , t1.read_flag , t1.msg_id from sys_user_msg_relation t1 where t1.rel_id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_msg_relation t1 where t1.rel_id in (${ids} )
mapper.update: update sys_user_msg_relation t1 set t1.validate_state='0' where t1.rel_id in( ${ids})
mapper.select: select t1.id from sys_user t1 where t1.validate_state='1' and exists (select * from sys_role_user t2 where t2.validate_state='1' and t2.target_id=t1.id )
